description: Wait, was that “Happy” singer Pharrell Williams with an on-point political analysis?During an appearance on the “Ellen” show, the famously be-hatted pop star deviated from the usual entertainers-endorsing-politicians script wherein the celebs gush about how cool their chosen candidate is. Williams is firmly in Camp Hillary Clinton — and he’s arguing that voters should toss out the old “who would you rather have a beer with” test.Read full article >>
title: Reliable Source: Clinton supporter Pharrell Williams makes an astute political observation
